name: null_values
description: Null value handling in JSON-RPC requests, responses, and data structures

params_schema.description: Parameters that may contain null values

result_schema.description: Response that may contain null values

examples.name: null_params_field
examples.description: Request with null params field (valid in JSON-RPC 2.0)

examples.name: missing_params_field
examples.description: Request without params field at all (valid in JSON-RPC 2.0)

examples.name: null_result_response
examples.description: Valid response with null result value

examples.name: null_in_array
examples.description: Array containing null values mixed with other elements

examples.name: null_in_object_field
examples.description: Object with null value for a field

examples.name: nested_null_values
examples.description: Nested object structure with null values at various levels

examples.name: null_vs_empty_string
examples.description: Distinguishing between null and empty string

examples.name: null_id_field
examples.description: Request with null as the id value (valid in JSON-RPC 2.0)
